title: The Struggle of a Weak Aristocrat in a Different World Our Domain is Surrounded by Large Aristocrats, and It’s a Big Problem! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Kingdom Building   Magic   Maids   Male Protagonist   Modern Knowledge   Nobles   Polygamy   Reincarnated in Another World   Royalty   Wars
author: Kitatu
description:
Former Japanese Chris reincarnated in a different world as the third son of a poor aristocrat, dreaming of a slow life. 

However, a letter arrives that his two older brothers will become mathematicians in the royal capital, and Chris will become the successor.

When he checked the current situation as a lord, he found that the power of the royal family had weakened, and the world was on the verge of war! Surrounded by great nobles, he's doomed to be destroyed!

“I'm determined to survive and live a slow life!”
>
